Clauses & Conditionals.question: Which is a third conditional sentence?
options: If it rains, we will stay home.
If I had studied, I would have passed.
If she sees this, she’ll cry.
Clauses & Conditionals.answer: If I had studied, I would have passed.

Clauses & Conditionals.answer: If I knew the answer, I would have told you.
